abstract: A group backing Mr. Trump has filmed an ad intended to air in New York during the primary that tells the story of his financing fliers to help the police capture a serial rapist in the 1990s.

headline.main: Group Backing Donald Trump Highlights His Role in Capturing Rapist

snippet: A group backing Mr. Trump has filmed an ad intended to air in New York during the primary that tells the story of his financing fliers to help the police capture a serial rapist in the 1990s.
